checkForUpdatesDesc: Check if a newer version of Jan is available.
checkForBackendUpdatesDesc: Check if a newer version of the Llamacpp backend is available.
noBackendUpdateAvailable: You're running the latest Llamacpp version
backendUpdateError: Failed to check for Llamacpp updates
failedToRelocateDataFolderDesc: Failed to relocate data folder. Please try again.
factoryResetDesc: This will reset all app settings to their defaults. This can't be undone. We only recommend this if the app is corrupted.
documentationDesc: Learn how to use Jan and explore its features.
releaseNotesDesc: See what's new in the latest version of Jan.
discordDesc: Join our community for support and discussions.
reportAnIssueDesc: Found a bug? Help us out by filing an issue on GitHub.
creditsDesc1: üëã Jan is built with ‚ù§Ô∏è by the Menlo Research team.
creditsDesc2: Special thanks to our open-source dependencies‚Äîespecially llama.cpp and Tauri‚Äîand to our amazing AI community.

dataFolder.appDataDesc: Default location for messages and other user data.
dataFolder.appLogsDesc: View detailed logs of the App.

others.spellCheckDesc: Enable spell check for your threads.
others.resetFactoryDesc: Restore application to its initial state, erasing all models and chat history. This action is irreversible and recommended only if the application is corrupted.

interface.title: Interface
interface.windowBackgroundDesc: Set the app window's background color.
interface.appMainViewDesc: Set the main content area's background color.
interface.primaryDesc: Set the primary color for interface accents.
interface.accentDesc: Select the accent color used across the UI.
interface.destructiveDesc: Set the highlight color for destructive actions.
interface.resetToDefaultDesc: Reset all interface settings to default.
interface.resetInterfaceSuccessDesc: All interface settings have been restored to default.
interface.threadScrollDesc: Choose how the chat viewport should react when new messages arrive.
interface.threadScrollFlowHint: Keeps the viewport anchored to the latest message you send.
interface.threadScrollStickyHint: Automatically follows along as replies stream in real time.
interface.tokenCounterCompactDesc: Show token counter inside chat input. When disabled, token counter appears below the input.
interface.showLineNumbersDesc: Display line numbers in code blocks.
interface.resetCodeBlockStyleDesc: Reset code block style to default.
interface.resetCodeBlockSuccessDesc: Code block style has been restored to default.

hardware.name: Name
hardware.enableVulkanDesc: Use Vulkan API for GPU acceleration. Do not enable Vulkan if you have an NVIDIA GPU as it may cause compatibility issues.

httpsProxy.proxyUrlDesc: The URL and port of your proxy server.
httpsProxy.authenticationDesc: Credentials for the proxy server, if required.
httpsProxy.noProxyDesc: A comma-separated list of hosts to bypass the proxy.
httpsProxy.ignoreSslDesc: Allow self-signed or unverified certificates. This may be required for some proxies but reduces security. Only enable if you trust your proxy.
httpsProxy.proxySslDesc: Validate the SSL certificate when connecting to the proxy.
httpsProxy.proxyHostSslDesc: Validate the SSL certificate of the proxy's host.
httpsProxy.peerSslDesc: Validate the SSL certificates of peer connections.
httpsProxy.hostSslDesc: Validate the SSL certificates of destination hosts.

localApiServer.title: Local API Server
localApiServer.serverLogsDesc: View detailed logs of the local API server.
localApiServer.runOnStartupDesc: Automatically start the Local API Server when the application launches.
localApiServer.serverPortDesc: Port number for the API server.
localApiServer.apiKeyDesc: Authenticate requests with an API key.
localApiServer.trustedHostsDesc: Hosts allowed to access the server, separated by commas.
localApiServer.corsDesc: Allow cross-origin requests to the API server.
localApiServer.verboseLogsDesc: Enable detailed server logs for debugging.
localApiServer.proxyTimeoutDesc: Time to wait for a response from the local model, seconds.

privacy.helpUsImproveDesc: To help us improve Jan, you can share anonymous data like feature usage and user counts. We never collect your chats or personal information.
privacy.privacyPolicy: You have full control over your data. Learn more in our Privacy Policy.
privacy.analyticsDesc: To improve Jan, we need to understand how it's used‚Äîbut only with your help. You can change this setting anytime.
privacy.privacyPromises: Your choice here won't change our core privacy promises:
privacy.promise1: Your conversations stay private and on your device
privacy.promise2: We never collect your personal information or chat content
privacy.promise3: All data sharing is anonymous and aggregated
privacy.promise4: You can opt out anytime without losing functionality
privacy.promise5: We're transparent about what we collect and why

general.couldNotRelocateToRoot: Cannot relocate data folder to root directory. Please choose another location.
general.couldNotResetRootDirectory: Cannot reset data folder when it's set to a root directory. Please delete the data folder manually.
general.failedToRelocateDataFolderDesc: Failed to relocate data folder. Please try again.
general.checkForUpdatesDesc: Check if a newer version of Jan is available.
general.factoryResetDesc: This will reset all app settings to their defaults. This can't be undone. We only recommend this if the app is corrupted.
general.huggingfaceTokenDesc: Your HuggingFace API token for accessing models.
general.documentationDesc: Learn how to use Jan and explore its features.
general.releaseNotesDesc: See what's new in the latest version of Jan.
general.discordDesc: Join our community for support and discussions.
general.reportAnIssueDesc: Found a bug? Help us out by filing an issue on GitHub.
general.creditsDesc1: üëã Jan is built with ‚ù§Ô∏è by the Menlo Research team.
general.creditsDesc2: Special thanks to our open-source dependencies‚Äîespecially llama.cpp and Tauri‚Äîand to our amazing AI community.

attachments.subtitle: Configure document attachments, size limits, and retrieval behavior.
attachments.enableDesc: Allow uploading and indexing documents for retrieval.
attachments.parseModeDesc: Choose how parsed documents are added to conversations.
attachments.autoInlineThresholdDesc: Fraction of the model context used as the cutoff for inlining parsed files on local models.
attachments.maxFileDesc: Maximum size per file. Enforced at upload and processing time.
attachments.thresholdDesc: Minimum similarity score (0-1). Only used for linear cosine search, not ANN.
attachments.searchModeDesc: Choose between sqlite-vec ANN, linear cosine, or auto.
attachments.chunkSizeDesc: Approximate max characters per chunk for embeddings.

changeDataFolder.title: Change Data Folder Location
changeDataFolder.description: Are you sure you want to change the data folder location? This will move all your data to the new location and restart the application.

remoteAccess.title: Remote Access
remoteAccess.description: Access your Jan assistant remotely through messaging platforms.
remoteAccess.installError: Installation failed. Please check your Node.js installation.
remoteAccess.startError: Couldn't start Remote Access. Please try again.
remoteAccess.stopError: Couldn't stop Remote Access. Please try again.
remoteAccess.nodeRequired: Node.js 22+ is required. Please install it first.
remoteAccess.portInUse: Port 18789 is in use. Please close other apps using it.

addChannel.title: Add Channel
addChannel.description: Select a messaging platform to connect

channelDescriptions.telegram: Connect via Telegram bot for secure messaging
channelDescriptions.whatsapp: Connect via WhatsApp for business messaging
channelDescriptions.discord: Connect via Discord bot for server-based chat

securitySettings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

tailscaleSettings.funnelEnabled: Tailscale Funnel enabled - Your endpoint is now publicly accessible

cloudflare.tunnelIdSaveError: Failed to save Cloudflare tunnel ID

telegramWizard.title: Connect Telegram
telegramWizard.description: Set up Telegram to chat with Jan remotely

step1.title: Create a Bot
step1.instruction2: Send /newbot to create a new bot
step1.instruction3: Follow the prompts to name your bot
step1.instruction4: Copy the bot token (it looks like: 123456789:ABCdefGHI...)

step2.title: Enter Token
step2.invalidToken: Invalid token. Please check and try again.

step4.title: Pair Your Device
step4.instruction: Send this code to your Telegram bot:

step5.title: Connected!
step5.instruction: You can now chat with Jan by sending messages to your bot.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.

whatsappWizard.title: Connect WhatsApp
whatsappWizard.description: Set up WhatsApp to chat with Jan remotely
whatsappWizard.whatsappWizardDescription: Connect your WhatsApp account to enable remote messaging
whatsappWizard.scanQrCodeDescription: Scan the QR code with your WhatsApp app
whatsappWizard.setupDescription: Connect your WhatsApp account to enable remote messaging
whatsappWizard.whatsappStep1: Click 'Start Setup' - we'll configure everything automatically
whatsappWizard.whatsappStep2: Scan the QR code with your WhatsApp app
whatsappWizard.whatsappStep3: Start chatting with Jan from your phone!
whatsappWizard.settingUpDescription: Configuring OpenClaw and preparing WhatsApp connection. This may take a moment...
whatsappWizard.qrCodeInstructions: Open WhatsApp on your phone and scan this QR code
whatsappWizard.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your connection
whatsappWizard.whatsappConnectedDescription: Your WhatsApp is now connected. You can chat with Jan by sending messages.

discordWizard.title: Connect Discord
discordWizard.description: Set up Discord to chat with Jan remotely

step1.title: Create a Bot
step1.instruction1: Go to the Discord Developer Portal
step1.instruction4: Click 'Reset Token' to get your bot token

step2.title: Enter Token
step2.invalidToken: Invalid token. Please check and try again.

step4.instruction: You can now chat with Jan by inviting your bot to servers.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
